Articles.Content:
Just a little something I whipped up.

DL link if you guys want it.

[![screenshot6108_zps4mjkkqc1.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot6108_zps4mjkkqc1.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot6108_zps4mjkkqc1.png.html)

[![screenshot6111_zpsi9jphjpd.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot6111_zpsi9jphjpd.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot6111_zpsi9jphjpd.png.html)

Awesome.

Hmmm.. what if a TF2 sentry was made, but using BDArmory?
Neat! Very clever build, I love things like that, so simple, but they look so much not like KSP.
I challenge you to make a sentry that can upgrade itself from Tier 1 to Tier 3! You can use IR if you want, but you get bonus points for doing it stock, it it's even possible.
Need a dispenser here need a dispenser here
